original_text: When you eat special meals together as believers, those false teachers meet with you. But they are dangerous! They will stop you showing your love for one another. They come only because they want to eat too much. They do not respect God or other people. They only think about themselves and they are not ashamed. They are like clouds that you think will bring rain. But the wind blows those clouds along and there is no rain. They are like trees that have no fruit, even at the time for harvest. People pull trees like that out of the ground. They are completely dead and can give no fruit.
korean_text: 그들은 기탄 없이 너희와 함께 먹으니 너희의 애찬에 암초요 자기 몸만 기르는 목자요 바람에 불려가는 물 없는 구름이요 죽고 또 죽어 뿌리까지 뽑힌 열매 없는 가을 나무요

sentences.original_text: When you eat special meals together as believers
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 믿는 자들로서 함께 특별한 식사를 할 때

sentences.original_text: those false teachers meet with you
sentences.korean_translation: 그 거짓 교사들이 너희와 함께 만난다

sentences.original_text: They will stop you showing your love for one another
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 너희가 서로 사랑을 나타내는 것을 막을 것이다

sentences.original_text: They come only because they want to eat too much
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 단지 너무 많이 먹고 싶어서만 온다

sentences.original_text: They do not respect God or other people
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 하나님이나 다른 사람들을 존중하지 않는다

sentences.original_text: They are like clouds that you think will bring rain
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 비를 가져올 것이라고 생각하는 구름과 같다

sentences.original_text: But the wind blows those clouds along and there is no rain
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 바람이 그 구름들을 몰고가고 비는 없다

sentences.original_text: They are like trees that have no fruit
even at the time for harvest
People pull trees like that out of the ground
